RelatedSentence: A Meridian church honored several young men and women during a baccalaureate service Sunday evening .

A0: Historic First Union Missionary Baptist Church
RelatedSentence: Historic First Union Missionary Baptist Church hosted a special ceremony to honor all students in the community for their achievements .
The ceremony , entitled Celebrating Success One Step at a Time , presented certificates and bibles to the students in attendance .
